title: This AI For Pull Requests Is Like A Senior Developer Reviewing My Code

rawLines.text: Hey everyone, as you're well aware, AI
is completely changing the game of
coding. You are probably already using
some kind of AI co-pilot and these are
really good and I think over time more
and more of the code is going to be
generated by these AI co-pilots and our
job as human developers is basically to
review the code that the AI has
generated. So I think as developers, we
are becoming more like a reviewer of AI
and maybe we are manually adding some
tweaks. Maybe we're editing a little bit
just to get it exactly right. But
overall, I think 90 95% of the code is
going to be generated by AI. And our job
is mostly to review it. Make sure for
example that the highle structure of the
code is correct. Um that it's not making
some tricky logical mistakes and just
adding some final tweaks. So that is
where it's going I think with uh these
AI co-pilots. These are really good. Now
that is for generating the codes in the
first place. Now when you have created
code in a team especially you usually
have some kind of workflow where you're
going to merge it into the main branch.
So you do your work on some other branch
and then when it needs to go to
production you're going to merge it into
main. Usually there's a review process
at that point and a lot of that is still
currently being done by humans but I
think also that review process is going
to be done with AI actually. So let me
actually show you another tool that I've

are today's sponsor and this is an AI
tool that I'm also generally impressed
with. I think this is going to do
something very similar as what these AI
copilots have done for generating code.
I think code rabbit is going to do

and it just basically takes a lot of the

like with the AI copilots, it takes a
